intro: Rhinephyllum schonlandii, commonly known as the Schonland's rhinephyllum, is a rare and striking plant native to the arid regions of southern Africa. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to survive in harsh, dry environments. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, Rhinephyllum schonlandii is considered a vulnerable species.
